title: where do i go to to redeem my codes that i got?
body: i updated my league of legends server and i didn't quit like it but everyone got to adopt to the change. But i got this code from a website and i was trying to redeem my code but cant seem to find can some one please help?

replies.body:
If you go to the store and hit the *purchase RP* button, you should see an option for *Codes & Prepaid cards*. You can put a code in there and it will redeem the content or RP  that it's for.

I hope this helped!
